Returns: The new set of events to watch, or 0 to unregister the listener. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_INPUT_E@, @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_OUTPUT_E@, and @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_ERROR_E@
Parameters: FileDescriptor: The file descriptor. This value must never be null.

int: The set of events that occurred: a combination of the @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_INPUT_E@, @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_OUTPUT_E@, and @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_ERROR_E@ event masks. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_INPUT_E@, @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_OUTPUT_E@, and @B_android#os#MessageQueue#OnFileDescriptorEventListener#EVENT_ERROR_E@
onFileDescriptorEvents(java.io.FileDescr.Description: Called when a file descriptor receives events.
onFileDescriptorEvents(java.io.FileDescr.FullName: public abstract int onFileDescriptorEvents (FileDescriptor fd, int events)

ClassDesc: A listener which is invoked when file descriptor related events occur.
